title: HotspotDomConfig
description: An instance of a hotspot dom.

id.title: ID
id.description: The HTML ID to append to this DOM hotspot. This ID is different than the UID one

class.title: Class
class.description: The class or list of class to add to the hotspot, useful to set CSS to the hotspot by group.

width.title: Width
width.description: The width (in HTML referential) of the hotspot. It is used for placing the hotspot according to its center.

height.title: Height
height.description: The height (in HTML referential) of the hotspot. It is used for placing the hotspot according to its center.

color.title: Color
color.description: The default background color of the hotspot, in any valide CSS value.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index of the hotspot, will be used to order hotspots in the z axis.
